column3: March 17 A BlackRock Inc  portfolio manager said Thursday that he continues to see value in emerging-market bonds from Asia to Latin America a day after the Federal Reserve left rates unchanged and acknowledged global economic risks.

column6: as aircraft manufacturers eye one of the world's fastest-growing aviation markets to offset any weaker sales elsewhere.
